song.title: Exodia_(long_version)
song.info: composed & conducted by # fabrice gillet # _-=-> arpegiator <-=- for therapy?/outlaws party 94 !!! if you like the work contact me at : 24 clos champs bouton 6760 virton -belgium- tel : +32/(0)63570330 notice : this music contains severals moments of accoustic research & obviously some great melodies approved by talented & very popular musicians !!! so organizers please play it till the end or don't play it !!! coz nothing is more desapointed than to destroy the art of everyone ... that proves buziness & out of respect thank you all ... 5'50'' long ! special tempo at 128 marsh 1994 (c) f.g.
